format: A data frame with 428 observations on the following 2 variables.

parameters.pH: pH value of the soil sample
parameters.Ca: Calcium content of the soil sample

reference: For more information on the dataset, cf. Goegebeur et al. (2005).
title: Condroz Data
description:
Description
Dataset with pH-value and Calcium content in soil samples, collected in different
communities of the Condroz region in Belgium. The data pertain to a
subset of 428 samples with a pH-value between 7.0 and 7.5.
